traceability.evidence: All 7 tests in test/cli.config-file.test.js passed under vitest, confirming: - Defaults applied from .dry-aged-deps.json - CLI flags override config values - Syntax errors in JSON exit with code 2 and clear message - Unknown keys exit with code 2 and ’Unknown config key’ error - Out-of-range values exit with code 2 - Custom config-file flag is supported and missing files error correctly Additionally, README.md includes usage and schema examples, and existing tests for CLI options and defaults all pass. The implementation in src/config-loader.js and src/cli-options.js fully meets the specified acceptance criteria.
traceability.notes: Configuration file support is fully implemented per story 010.0: loading, merging, validation, error handling, CLI overrides, optionality, defaults, and documentation are all in place. JSON schema file remains optional per spec.
